code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import"./Talks.css";import TalkCard from"../../components/talkCard/TalkCard";import{talkSection}from"../../portfolio";import{Fade}from"react-reveal";import StyleContext from"../../contexts/StyleContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Talks(){const{isDark}=useContext(StyleContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Fade,{bottom:true,duration:1000,distance:"20px",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"main",id:"talks",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"talk-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"talk-header-title",children:talkSection.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:isDark?"dark-mode talk-header-subtitle":"subTitle talk-header-subtitle",children:talkSection.subtitle}),talkSection.talks.map(talk=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TalkCard,{talkDetails:{title:talk.title,subtitle:talk.subtitle,slides_url:talk.slides_url,event_url:talk.event_url,image:talk.image,isDark}});})]})})});}
